name: Sharkey's Helicopters, Inc.
about: Sharkey's Helicopters, Inc., based in West Lebanon, New Hampshire, is the oldest and largest helicopter training facility in the region. Established with a rich history, the school offers comprehensive helicopter flight training programs, including commercial pilot certificates and flight instructor certifications. Students can train on a variety of aircraft, including the Enstrom piston and turbine helicopters, as well as the Bell Jet Ranger, Bell Long Ranger III, and the Bell 407. Sharkey's Helicopters is a Part 61 FAA-approved flight school, providing high-quality instruction to both domestic and international students. With a focus on safety and excellence, Sharkey's Helicopters, Inc. has built a reputation as a premier helicopter training institution.
